text: Ya yun na kaho kay agar hum per koi kitab nazil hoti to hum inn say bhi ziyada raah-e-raast per hotay. So abb tumharay pass tumhara rab kay pass say aik kitab wazeh aur rehnumaee ka zariya aur rehmat aa chuki hai. Abb iss shaks say ziyada kaun zalim hoga jo humari inn aayaton ko jhoota bataye aur iss say rokay. Hum jald hi inn logon ko jo kay humari aayaton say roktay hain inn kay iss rokney kay sabab sakht saza den gay
